album.name: Catherine's 4th birthday
album.description: Armed with Connect 4 we headed off to Goulbourn Manor to celebrate Catherine's 4th birthday...

image.caption: In the house/slide thing
image.description: Christoper enjoys going down the slide head first.

image.caption: On the slide
image.description: Catherine about to run or dive down the slide.

image.caption: On the swing
image.description: Catherine runs across the path of brother, who is being pushed by Richard.

image.caption: Catherine in goal
image.description: A well known goalkeeping technique of sticking your tongue out at the ball.
